13  package biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.cache;
14  
15  import biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.source.LessSource;
16  
17  /**
18   * Represents the cache that allows deleting its content.
19   * @since 1.0
20   */
21  public interface DeletableCache {
22  
23      /**
24       * Deletes all cache entries.
25       * @since 1.0
26       */
27      void deleteAll();
28  
29      /**
30       * Delete cache entries related with the {@link LessSource}.
31       * @param source the {@link LessSource}.
32       * @since 1.0
33       */
34      void delete(LessSource source);
35  }
